name: The Kingdom Way (Incomplete)
description:
This entry had the primary goal of learning the Bolt Visual Scripting language.
Sadly,  due to this also being the first time using bolt, I was unable to get the specific gameplay elements working.

As a result, this is an annotated version of the work I had done, and not a completed game.

The core idea is that your love is in a distance kingdom, but the roads are too dangerous for such an important person to make the journey.

You must convince the other lands to join your kingdom, creating an unbroken path which your love can safely travel down. The Kingdom Way.
